title: Ocmulgee National Monument: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth           Children enjoy themselves and learn while visiting Ocmulgee National Monument   Children who visit Ocmulgee National Monument experience  many different cultural histories. These eager learners also enjoy being out in the natural resource to view the birds, flowers, trees, and wildlife of this urban green space. Self guided walks and our museum exhibits. The children can fill out a Junior Ranger Booklet and earn a badge and patch. Ask the Ranger at Visitor Center desk for a booklet and enjoy exploring the park!   Become a Junior Ranger Park fun- A word find for kids
